column2: "Oh? It's you! Do you need Lisa for something?"
"Lisa's just casually going around fighting things just for something to do."
"Now that things have calmed down a bit amongst the ARKS, things have gotten less exciting."
"That being said, Lisa would find it hard to tell you this place is all that exciting either..."
"The best they've got are those big Kuronite people. There's also Darkers, so there's plenty of stuff to shoot and hunt! But, well..."
"But how come the Shironian people worship Lisa? Why is that?"
"When Lisa shoots one of those Kuronite people, the Shironians make a big fuss and start cheering for her. It's really bad for Lisa's mood, you know?"
"Lisa even tried shooting one of the Shironians, but they just keep worshipping her. It's awful. Lisa might have met her match."
"...Then again, if this means Lisa doesn't have to watch where she's aiming, her job will be much easier. Hehehe."
